message: So this whole thing could be graded without ever printing off a paper. I guess those trees are safe for now.
Heh. You're just saying that because my friend actually had the booby prize.
Hah! My cousin just got through saying the other day how she's really just a 12 year old boy at heart.
Just thought of another item: "teh" - Adam's mathcaddy site gave me the idea.
Interesting how there are all of these apps that just use Twitter to signup. If I ever get hacked, I'm totally doomed.
I'm so immature. I laughed at the word "booby"
So, should we organize this a bit more?  I was thinking of adding to the spreadsheet a list of everyone's names.  We can either tally as we go tonight, or try to do some ahead of time.
I like that idea. Maybe vertical columns of the "features" and horizontal columns of each participant?
We can use my laptop to view the sites and your rig to score them.
I must be as well, cause I still get the giggles over stuff like that.
Do we want to ask someone to bring a projector?
Aha.  I just assumed projector.  Who's the best to ask?
I asked on meetup.com, so we'll see. I don't recall if Adam has one.
